title: Former Mexican official sentenced to 38 years in U.S. prison for taking bribes
content: Genaro García Luna was charged in U.S. District Court in Brooklyn in 2019 with acting as an enabler for the Sinaloa drug cartel.
summary: Genaro García Luna was charged in U.S. District Court in Brooklyn in 2019 with acting as an enabler for the Sinaloa drug cartel.

title: A voyage into the world’s most contested waterway
content: A small flotilla, a big mission and a daunting obstacle. Today, we voyage into the most contested waterway in the world: the South China Sea.
summary: A small flotilla, a big mission and a daunting obstacle. Today, we voyage into the most contested waterway in the world: the South China Sea.

title: Zelensky reveals ‘victory plan,’ calls for urgent NATO membership
content: The plan includes permission for strikes inside Russia and assistance with air defenses, but Western reaction to it has been muted so far.
summary: The plan includes permission for strikes inside Russia and assistance with air defenses, but Western reaction to it has been muted so far.

title: Italy sends first migrants to Albania, an offshoring model for Europe
content: Italy’s far-right government is rolling out what it says could be a model for solving one of the West’s most politically charged problems: illegal migration.
summary: Italy’s far-right government is rolling out what it says could be a model for solving one of the West’s most politically charged problems: illegal migration.

content: Israeli forces targeted Beirut’s southern suburbs with airstrikes, ending several days of relative calm in the Lebanese capital.

title: Israeli airstrikes resume in southern Beirut; Nabatiyeh mayor killed

title: Weekly rally for return of hostages to resume after brief hiatus
At least 94 killed, 50 injured in fuel tanker explosion in Nigeria
content: The driver of the tanker lost control of the vehicle, which tipped over in Nigeria’s Jigawa state. As locals rushed to retrieve the fuel, the tank exploded.
summary: The driver of the tanker lost control of the vehicle, which tipped over in Nigeria’s Jigawa state. As locals rushed to retrieve the fuel, the tank exploded.

title: U.S. warns Israel it may withhold arms unless Gaza aid starts flowing

content: Zelensky’s victory plan will likely be a far cry from the outright “victory” many hoped for, as cynicism and fatigue set in among Ukraine’s western allies.

title: U.S. warns Israel arms transfers could halt unless humanitarian situation in Gaza improves
content: Since the spring, the amount of aid delivered to Gaza “has dropped by more than 50 percent,” the United States says.

title: Conkers championship caught up in chestnut-of-steel cheating commotion
content: “We think he’s innocent, but we’re just checking,” said a spokesman for the World Conker Championships, of allegations that the male champion swapped a chestnut for a steel nut.
summary: “We think he’s innocent, but we’re just checking,” said a spokesman for the World Conker Championships, of allegations that the male champion swapped a chestnut for a steel nut.

title: Netanyahu tells U.S. Israel will strike Iranian military instead of oil or nuclear sites, officials say

content: The signal is being seen in Washington as a sign of restraint after concerns that an Israeli strike on oil or nuclear facilities could trigger a wider war.

title: Hezbollah official says all of Israel is a target after attacks in Lebanon

title: Behind the mask: How a soccer star became a cocaine trafficker
content: A former star player for Ajax Amsterdam and the Netherlands became a major cocaine trafficker and has found refuge in the United Arab Emirates, where he continues to play.
summary: A former star player for Ajax Amsterdam and the Netherlands became a major cocaine trafficker and has found refuge in the United Arab Emirates, where he continues to play.

title: Sudan’s civil war fueled by secret arms shipments from UAE and Iran

title: White House, VP Harris mourn Palestinian American boy on anniversary of his killing in Illinois
